title: Biden’s agenda is ‘an arrow in mid-flight’
description: On Capitol Hill, moderate and progressive Democrats continue to negotiate over their massive domestic spending bill, the timing on a vote for infrastructure, government funding and the debt. But with all the back and forth over what Democrats want, there’s one voice that seems to be missing from the conversation: and that’s the president of the United States.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: On Capitol Hill, moderate and progressive Democrats continue to negotiate over their massive domestic spending bill, the timing on a vote for infrastructure, government funding and the debt. But with all the back and forth over what Democrats want, there’s one voice that seems to be missing from the conversation: and that’s the president of the United States.
itunes:title: Biden’s agenda is ‘an arrow in mid-flight’
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Karen Tumulty, columnist and Deputy Editorial Page Editor for the Washington Post and Evan Osnos, staff writer for the New Yorker and author of a new book, “Wildland: The Making of America’s Fury” join Chuck to talk about Democrats’ negotiations over President Biden’s infrastructure and spending bills.
itunes:subtitle: Karen Tumulty, columnist and Deputy Editorial Page Editor for the Washington Post and Evan Osnos, staff writer for the New Yorker and author of a new book, “Wildland: The Making of America’s Fury” join Chuck to talk about Democrats’ negotiations over President Biden’s infrastructure and spending bills.
